channel.title: Service on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Service on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: -- C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES Service and UX/UI Design | 2017, Professiona Work Objective After the deregulation, which direction should the electric power company aim for? In 2016, full-scale deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies have entered the electricity market. Chubu Electric Power Company (C-EPCO), a Japanese electricity utility provider for the mid-Chubu region of Honshu island, Japan, must shift to a new paradigm of customer service in order to improve its retention capability.

item.title: FUTURE SUPERMARKET DESIGN INAGEYA
item.description: -- FUTURE SUPERMARKET DESIGN INAGEYA Service Design | 2016, Professional Work Objective What should Inageya do to go “beyond” supermarket? Inagea is a long-established supermarket in Japan. However, in a situation that society and family structures are changing, a role of supermarket also needs to change in Japan. Clients were struggling for planning a strong concept of a next-generation supermarket in 2020 with consideration for a sustainable ecosystem from producers to consumers and of course customer-first.
